tidbits.title: Volcanic Islands
tidbits.description: Cape Verde is a collection of volcanic islands, offering dramatic landscapes with volcanic peaks, stunning beaches, and a mix of Portuguese and African influences.

tidbits.title: Morna Music
tidbits.description: The islands are known for Morna music, a soulful genre blending Portuguese fado with African rhythms, reflecting the nation's cultural heritage and emotions.

tidbits.title: Resilient Society
tidbits.description: Cape Verdeans are known for their resilience, having endured droughts and other challenges, yet maintaining a vibrant culture, warm hospitality, and a strong sense of community.
